archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0356
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to ensure that if a customer does not completed the signup journey, their email address used can be reused later so that customers who drop out can try again at a later date without any issues

properties.value: Can be configured out of the box (prospective customer creation at some step of the journey), but details need to be defined (retention schedule etc)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
